context: In 2005, Altair Engineering was an established provider of CAE (Computer-Aided Engineering) and simulation software solutions, serving industries such as aerospace, automotive, and energy. The competitive landscape in the simulation and engineering software space was dominated by established players offering similar modeling, analysis, and visualization capabilities. Altair, founded in 1985 and based in Troy, Michigan, competed with major enterprise software vendors in the high-performance computing and simulation markets.
